quote: A man is great not because he hasn't failed; a man is great because failure hasn't stopped him. – Confucius
fact: Facetious and abstemious contain all the vowels in the correct order, as does arsenious, meaning "containing arsenic."
joke: Why do crabs never give to charity? Because they’re shellfish.
